article_title: California’s Kevin McCarthy leads emboldened congressional Republicans
article_text: Californians to Watch in 2015: House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy, the Bakersfield Republican who recently ascended to the No. 2 position in the House, has a long list of policy goals in the coming year.

article_metadata.title: California’s Kevin McCarthy leads emboldened congressional Republicans | The Sacramento Bee
